name: CAICT Vehicle Intelligent Agent Evaluation Guidelines
provider: China Academy of Information and Communications Technology (CAICT)
use_case: Guidelines for evaluating intelligent vehicle agents across perception, decision-making, and safety assurance.
data_summary: Encourages data traceability, scenario tagging, and safety-critical dataset coverage for intelligent agents.
monitoring: Recommends lifecycle monitoring of deployed intelligent agents and feedback loops to improve performance.
emergency_plan: Advises on incident response and corrective actions for safety events in automotive agents.
obligations: Define evaluation scenarios covering key operational design domains.
Measure perception, interaction, and safety indicators for intelligent agents.
Document traceable evidence supporting compliance with safety and reliability expectations.
